description: Angular component for the dashboard page, including dependency injection, lifecycle hooks, and data loading logic.

classes.name: DashboardComponent
classes.description: Angular component responsible for displaying the user dashboard, including loading user data and handling errors.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes data loading when the component is created.

methods.name: ngAfterViewInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that sets focus on the page title element after the view has been initialized.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Method that retrieves dashboard data from AuthService and updates component state accordingly.
